		
		Alpha: Gunther Panzer

		The Silver Fangs in Colorado are primarily of House Wrathblade, a German line of the Silver Fangs known for their creation of Klaives and Fetishes. Their primary hold of power is that their Kinfolk and members are spread through the National Park Service of Rocky Mountain National Park.
